segments.text: What ’ s wrong with you ? Why are you scratching so much ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel itchy ! I can ’ t stand it anymore ! I think I may be coming down with something . I feel lightheaded and weak .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me have a look . Whoa ! Get away from me !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you have chicken pox ! You are contagious ! Get away ! Don ’ t breathe on me !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe it ’ s just a rash or an allergy ! We can ’ t be sure until I see a doctor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well in the meantime you are a biohazard ! I didn ’ t get it when I was a kid and I ’ Ve heard that you can even die if you get it as an adult !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you serious ? You always blow things out of proportion . In any case , I think I ’ ll go take an oatmeal bath .
segments.speaker: S2
